instruction: Detect anomalies and outliers in time-series data using statistical and machine learning approaches. Implement algorithms like Isolation Forest, Local Outlier Factor, and statistical threshold methods to identify unusual patterns or data points.
description: Implement anomaly detection algorithms for time-series data. Identify outliers and unusual patterns using statistical and machine learning methods.
keywords: anomaly detection, outliers, time-series, isolation forest, statistical methods, python, scikit-learn, pattern recognition
